articles.title: Anne Hathaway Nearly Broke Jared Leto With A Joke About His Method Acting - HuffPost
articles.description: “I really respect Jared’s process, and I had a wonderful time working with ... whoever that was,” Hathaway said of her co-star.
articles.content:
Anne Hathaway and Jared Leto attend the premiere of "WeCrashed." 
Jared Leto has tormented his fair share of co-stars all in the name of method acting, so its long overdue for someone to poke fun at… [+2192 chars]

articles.title: Ellen DeGeneres paid her staff over $2M ahead of her final show, with Michelle Obama, on May 26 - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ellen DeGeneres is giving over $2 million in bonuses to her staff as she prepares for the final episode of her award-winning talk show, set to close on May 26 with Michelle Obama.

articles.title: Queen 'deeply upset' that '3 out of 4' of her children got divorced: report - Page Six
articles.description: Her sons, Prince Charles and Prince Andrew, and her daughter Princess Anne, were all divorced, making her son Prince Edward her only child to stay married.
articles.content:
